articles.title: Tribute paid to Kim Il Sung on Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Tribute paid to Kim Il Sung on Lunar New Year's Day 
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Over 2,679,000 working people, servicepersons and school youth and children across the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before statues of President Kim Il Sung standing in different parts of the country and paid tribute to him on the occasion of Lunar New Year's Day.
 In front of the statues they extended thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il for making folk holidays cheerful and glorifying the soul and the spirit of the Korean people building a powerful nation and vowed to be true to the Workers' Party of Korea's idea and army-based revolutionary leadership.

Greetings to Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian President
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of greetings to Seyed Mohammad Khatami, President of Iran, on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of the victory in the Islamic revolution in Iran.
 The message expressed belief that the cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests of the two peoples and wished the government and the people of Iran happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Iranian first Vice-President and Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Iranian first Vice-President and Foreign Minister
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Mohammad Reza Aref, first Vice-President of Iran, on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of the victory in the Islamic revolution in Iran.
 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger, the message wished him success in his work and the Iranian people happiness and prosperity.    
 Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his Iranian counterpart Kamal Kharrazi on the occasion.

articles.title: Pyongyang city delegation leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Pyongyang city delegation leaves for Russia
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city delegation led by Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, left for Russia today.
 The delegation was seen off at the airport by Jon Ho Hyon, vice-chairman of the committee, and Russian Ambassador here Andrei Karlov.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam meets Indonesian President's special envoy
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets Indonesian President's special envoy
    Pyongyang, February 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Nana Sutresna, special envoy of the Indonesian President who is political advisor to the president, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present there were Vice-Foreign Minister Kim Yong Il and other officials concerned, the special envoy's party and Indonesian Ambassador here Hendrati Sukendar Munthe.    
 The special envoy handed Kim Yong Nam a personal letter of President Megawati Soekarnoputri to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
